numbered_ace_sentences: 2. In every sport, there seem to be more players of color than coaches of color.
4. Soccer has the most coaches of color.
5. Soccer has almost the least players of color.
6. I wonder why Soccer has the most coaches of color but almost the least players of color.
7. This situation does not directly impact my community.
8. If I go pro in a sport then coaching is my most likely way to reach that goal.
9. The headline is: Racial Differences Among Professional Sports.
